Got it!\""},{"lineNumber":7324,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ニンジンとかリンゴでいいか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is carrot or apple okay?\""},{"lineNumber":7325,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それお菓子じゃなーい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's not a sweet!\""},{"lineNumber":7326,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そーら、球に乗ってみろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on, try riding the ball.\""},{"lineNumber":7327,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぱおぱおぱお！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Pao pao pao!\""},{"lineNumber":7328,"originalJapaneseLine":"マーシーは自身の身の丈ほどもある","translatedEnglishLine":"Mercy was faced with a ball about her own height,"},{"lineNumber":7329,"originalJapaneseLine":"球を目の前に転がされて、反射的に飛び乗った。","translatedEnglishLine":"which was rolled in front of her, and she reflexively jumped on it."},{"lineNumber":7330,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………はっ！　か、身体が勝手に！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hah! My body moves on its own!"},{"lineNumber":7331,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぱおぱお！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Pao pao!\""},{"lineNumber":7332,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほーれリンゴだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Here, an apple!\""},{"lineNumber":7333,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああっ、おのれーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, you bastard!\""},{"lineNumber":7334,"originalJapaneseLine":"マーシーは放り投げられたリンゴを","translatedEnglishLine":"Mercy caught the thrown apple"},{"lineNumber":7335,"originalJapaneseLine":"鼻でキャッチした。","translatedEnglishLine":"with her nose."},{"lineNumber":7336,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よし、お前のメシはこれで良いな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, this will be your meal then.\""},{"lineNumber":7337,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーん！　謎の本能が憎いのねーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aah! I hate this mysterious instinct!\""},{"lineNumber":7338,"originalJapaneseLine":"マーシーは鼻で器用にリンゴを口の中に押し込んで、","translatedEnglishLine":"Mercy skillfully pushed the apple into her mouth with her nose,"},{"lineNumber":7339,"originalJapaneseLine":"もしゃもしゃと食べ続けた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and continued munching away."},{"lineNumber":7340,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ。でもリンゴおいしい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah. But the apple is delicious...\""},{"lineNumber":7341,"originalJapaneseLine":"――それは昔々、ぱおぱおな頃の事。","translatedEnglishLine":"—That was long ago, back when pao pao was still a thing."},{"lineNumber":7342,"originalJapaneseLine":"マーシーちゃんたちが、魔物界を離れる日のこと。","translatedEnglishLine":"The day Mercy-chan and the others left the demon world."},{"lineNumber":7343,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、ぱおぱお。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, pao pao."},{"lineNumber":7344,"originalJapaneseLine":"　三人とも、ぱおぱおはぱおぱおだね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"All three of you, pao pao is pao pao, right?\""},{"lineNumber":7345,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーい、レーモンさま！　あたち、ひがし！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, Lord Raymond! I am East!\""},{"lineNumber":7346,"originalJapaneseLine":"「南」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"South.\""},{"lineNumber":7347,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぱおぱお！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Pao pao!\""},{"lineNumber":7348,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あぁ……では、ぱおぱお」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... then, pao pao.\""},{"lineNumber":7349,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ハム殿の命とあらば地の果てだろうと往くが。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If it is Lord Ham's order, I will go even to the ends of the earth."},{"lineNumber":7350,"originalJapaneseLine":"　往った先で何をしろと？」","translatedEnglishLine":"But what am I supposed to do when I get there?\""},{"lineNumber":7351,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぱおぱおぱおぱお。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Pao pao pao pao."},{"lineNumber":7352,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぱおぱおぱおぱお……が、名目だが。","translatedEnglishLine":"Pao pao pao pao... is the reason, though."},{"lineNumber":7353,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前達のぱおぱおのままにぱおぱおぱお」","translatedEnglishLine":"You should pao pao in your own way.\""},{"lineNumber":7354,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"... ?\""},{"lineNumber":7355,"originalJapaneseLine":"こたえられたルーシー、くびをひねったのね。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lucy, unable to answer, tilted her head in confusion."},{"lineNumber":7356,"originalJapaneseLine":"きっとぱおぱおしてたの。","translatedEnglishLine":"She was surely pao pao-ing."},{"lineNumber":7357,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃあ、あたち、おかしがいっぱいたべたいの！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then, I want to eat lots of sweets!"},{"lineNumber":7358,"originalJapaneseLine":"　たべながらさがすよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll search while eating.\""},{"lineNumber":7359,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む。それは儂も」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm. I feel the same.\""},{"lineNumber":7360,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぱおぱおーー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Pao pao—!"},{"lineNumber":7361,"originalJapaneseLine":"　でもぱおぱおでいいの、バークス様。ぱおぱお」","translatedEnglishLine":"But pao pao is fine, Lord Barks. Pao pao.\""},{"lineNumber":7362,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ……それでぱおぱお。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... Yes, pao pao."},{"lineNumber":7363,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とてもぱおぱおぱおだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Very much pao pao pao.\""},{"lineNumber":7364,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……これは、ぱおぱおのぱおかも知れぬ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...This might be the pao of pao pao..."},{"lineNumber":7365,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ガイ様の存命までには果たされぬ事かも……","translatedEnglishLine":"It might not be fulfilled in Lord Guy's lifetime..."},{"lineNumber":7366,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しかし、これしかない」","translatedEnglishLine":"But this is the only way.\""},{"lineNumber":7367,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私の視たぱおぱお……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The pao pao I saw..."},{"lineNumber":7368,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それを、お前達がぱおぱおするのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"You all must pao pao it."},{"lineNumber":7369,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぱおぱおに過ぎなくとも……波紋を生んでおくれ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if it's nothing but pao pao... please create ripples.\""},{"lineNumber":7370,"originalJapaneseLine":"バークス様、少しぱおぱおな感じだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Barks seemed somewhat pao pao."},{"lineNumber":7371,"originalJapaneseLine":"きっとぱおぱおしてたのだわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"He was surely pao pao-ing."},{"lineNumber":7372,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では……恐らくは、今生の別れか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then... this is probably our farewell in this lifetime."},{"lineNumber":7373,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さらばだ、娘達。ぱおぱお」","translatedEnglishLine":"Farewell, daughters. Pao pao.\""},{"lineNumber":7374,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そうなのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Is that so?\""},{"lineNumber":7375,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだろうね。ぱおぱお」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I suppose so. Pao pao.\""},{"lineNumber":7376,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい…………ぱおぱお」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes... pao pao.\""},{"lineNumber":7377,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――というわけでマーシーちゃん達は","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—And so, Mercy-chan and the others,"},{"lineNumber":7378,"originalJapaneseLine":"　バークス様と、涙の別れと使命を帯びて……","translatedEnglishLine":"with Lord Barks, parted with tears and took on their mission..."},{"lineNumber":7379,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"…………………………\""},{"lineNumber":7380,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"……………………\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「妖怪め……」
「というわけでマーシーちゃんにも
お菓子をお忘れ無く！　なのね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: don't forget the sweets! Got it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ニンジンとかリンゴでいいか？」
「それお菓子じゃなーい！」
「そーら、球に乗ってみろ」
「ぱおぱおぱお！」
マーシーは自身の身の丈ほどもある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mercy was faced with a ball about her own height,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 球を目の前に転がされて、反射的に飛び乗った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which was rolled in front of her, and she reflexively jumped on it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………はっ！　か、身体が勝手に！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hah! My body moves on its own!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぱおぱお！」
「ほーれリンゴだ！」
「ああっ、おのれーーー！」
マーシーは放り投げられたリンゴを
鼻でキャッチした。
「よし、お前のメシはこれで良いな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, this will be your meal then."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーん！　謎の本能が憎いのねーー！」
マーシーは鼻で器用にリンゴを口の中に押し込んで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mercy skillfully pushed the apple into her mouth with her nose,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしゃもしゃと食べ続けた。
「あ。でもリンゴおいしい……」
――それは昔々、ぱおぱおな頃の事。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —That was long ago, back when pao pao was still a thing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マーシーちゃんたちが、魔物界を離れる日のこと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The day Mercy-chan and the others left the demon world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、ぱおぱお。
三人とも、ぱおぱおはぱおぱおだね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All three of you, pao pao is pao pao, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーい、レーモンさま！　あたち、ひがし！」
「ぱおぱお！」
「あぁ……では、ぱおぱお」
「ハム殿の命とあらば地の果てだろうと往くが。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If it is Lord Ham's order, I will go even to the ends of the earth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 往った先で何をしろと？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But what am I supposed to do when I get there?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぱおぱおぱおぱお。
ぱおぱおぱおぱお……が、名目だが。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pao pao pao pao... is the reason, though.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前達のぱおぱおのままにぱおぱおぱお」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You should pao pao in your own way."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こたえられたルーシー、くびをひねったのね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lucy, unable to answer, tilted her head in confusion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっとぱおぱおしてたの。
「じゃあ、あたち、おかしがいっぱいたべたいの！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, I want to eat lots of sweets!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たべながらさがすよ」
「む。それは儂も」
「ぱおぱおーー！
でもぱおぱおでいいの、バークス様。ぱおぱお」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But pao pao is fine, Lord Barks. Pao pao."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……それでぱおぱお。
とてもぱおぱおぱおだ」
「……これは、ぱおぱおのぱおかも知れぬ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...This might be the pao of pao pao...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガイ様の存命までには果たされぬ事かも……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It might not be fulfilled in Lord Guy's lifetime...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、これしかない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But this is the only way."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私の視たぱおぱお……
それを、お前達がぱおぱおするのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You all must pao pao it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぱおぱおに過ぎなくとも……波紋を生んでおくれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if it's nothing but pao pao... please create ripples."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バークス様、少しぱおぱおな感じだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Barks seemed somewhat pao pao.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっとぱおぱおしてたのだわ。
「では……恐らくは、今生の別れか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then... this is probably our farewell in this lifetime.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらばだ、娘達。ぱおぱお」
「……そうなのか」
「そうだろうね。ぱおぱお」
「はい…………ぱおぱお」
「――というわけでマーシーちゃん達は
バークス様と、涙の別れと使命を帯びて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: with Lord Barks, parted with tears and took on their mission...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, I want to eat lots of sweets!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たべながらさがすよ」
「む。それは儂も」
「ぱおぱおーー！
でもぱおぱおでいいの、バークス様。ぱおぱお」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But pao pao is fine, Lord Barks. Pao pao."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……それでぱおぱお。
とてもぱおぱおぱおだ」
「……これは、ぱおぱおのぱおかも知れぬ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...This might be the pao of pao pao...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガイ様の存命までには果たされぬ事かも……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It might not be fulfilled in Lord Guy's lifetime...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、これしかない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But this is the only way."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私の視たぱおぱお……
それを、お前達がぱおぱおするのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You all must pao pao it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぱおぱおに過ぎなくとも……波紋を生んでおくれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if it's nothing but pao pao... please create ripples."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バークス様、少しぱおぱおな感じだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Barks seemed somewhat pao pao.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっとぱおぱおしてたのだわ。
「では……恐らくは、今生の別れか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then... this is probably our farewell in this lifetime.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらばだ、娘達。ぱおぱお」
「……そうなのか」
「そうだろうね。ぱおぱお」
「はい…………ぱおぱお」
「――というわけでマーシーちゃん達は
バークス様と、涙の別れと使命を帯びて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: with Lord Barks, parted with tears and took on their mission...
